00015 CyclicPolicyBias::CyclicPolicyBias(Approximator* approx, int cycleTime, double bias) {
00016 
00017     this->approx = approx;
00018     this->bias = bias;
00019     this->cycleTime = cycleTime;
00020 
00021     if (cycleTime%approx->getOutputDim() != 0) {
00022         cout<<"!! CyclicPolicyBias requires cycleTime="
00023             <<cycleTime
00024             <<" have outputs="
00025             <<approx->getOutputDim()
00026             <<" as a factor\n";
00027         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00028     }
00029     
00030     stepsPerControl = cycleTime/approx->getOutputDim();
00031 
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00038 void CyclicPolicyBias::doApprox(Observation& obs, Vector& output) {
00039 
00040     approx->doApprox(obs, output);
00041     
00042     output[(obs.getSteps()%cycleTime) / stepsPerControl] += bias;
00043 }
